title: Eight out of ten
brief_description: In its appeals, the American Cancer Society has found that eight out of ten people will give money if properly approached. Here is shows how the successful first appeal of the Arizona section was run; from the recruiting of chairman and leaders, through publicity and education, to the vital face-to-face method of appeal.
